theGamblignant:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theGamblignant:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theGamblignant:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theGamblignant:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.

theGamblignant:StarterRelic.NAME: Starter Relic
theGamblignant:StarterRelic.FLAVOR: There is no flavor. sorry. Terezi would be so pissed off if theres no flavor
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 4 to the first roll you make each combat.

theGamblignant:SuperStarterRelic.NAME: Super Starter Relic
theGamblignant:SuperStarterRelic.FLAVOR: There is still no flavor. Sorry im so sorry oh my god
DESCRIPTIONS: Add 20 to the first roll you make each combat.

theGamblignant:DimBulbRelic.NAME: Dim Bulb
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you roll a 1, add 2 to your next roll.

theGamblignant:DreamBubbleRelic.NAME: Dream Bubble
DESCRIPTIONS: When resting at a Rest Site, you may choose to also visit a random ? room.

theGamblignant:ScratchedCoinRelic.NAME: 20-Sided Coin
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, gain 1d20 Gold.

theGamblignant:ToxicTraitsRelic.NAME: Toxic Traits
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply Poison, apply 1 more.

theGamblignant:CoolSunglassesRelic.NAME: Cool Sunglasses
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take no damage in a turn, gain 1 Luck next turn.

theGamblignant:BionicBoundbeastRelic.NAME: Bionic Boundbeast
theGamblignant:BionicBoundbeastRelic.FLAVOR: You've heard the limbs of these creatures can bring luck. This one doesn't seem willing to part with any, though.

theGamblignant:BrightPowderRelic.NAME: Bright Powder
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 Luck.

theGamblignant:CloversHatRelic.NAME: Clover's Hat
theGamblignant:CloversHatRelic.FLAVOR: Doesn't have horn holes. Looking at it kinda pisses you off.
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose 75% of your max HP. Add 4 to all dice rolls.

theGamblignant:BloodSpadeRelic.NAME: Blood Spade
theGamblignant:BloodSpadeRelic.FLAVOR: What kind of blood even is this?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever your dice rolls in a single turn add up to 21, gain 4 Curse.

theGamblignant:PanicPupaRelic.NAME: Panic Pupa
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you roll a 1, gain 3 Block.
